Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Polygon
      • edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.core.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextSerializable, Shape, Serializable, Cloneable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class Polygon
extends Polygon
implements Shape
    A class that represents a polygon using a list of points.
    Author:
    eldawy

        Draws a shape to the given graphics.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics or canvas to draw to
        fileMBR - the MBR of the file in which the shape is contained
        imageWidth - width of the image to draw
        imageHeight - height of the image to draw
        scale - the scale used to convert shape coordinates to image coordinates

      • draw

        double xscale,
        double yscale)
        Description copied from interface: Shape
        Draws the shape to the given graphics and scale.
        Parameters:
        g - - the graphics to draw the shape to.
        xscale - - scale of the image x-axis in terms of pixels per points.
        yscale - - scale of the image y-axis in terms of pixels per points.
